name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_toys_789101_lego_creator_3in1
categories: Toys & Games > Building & Construction > LEGO Sets
title: LEGO Creator 3-in-1 Majestic Tiger to Red Panda or Koi Fish Building Kit 31129
description: Unleash creativity with the LEGO Creator 3-in-1 Majestic Tiger building set. This fantastic kit allows builders to construct a posable tiger, which can then be rebuilt into an adorable red panda or a graceful koi fish. Each model features realistic details and movable parts, providing endless hours of imaginative play. Perfect for animal lovers and aspiring builders aged 9 and up.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_toys_789102_barbie_dreamhouse
categories: Toys & Games > Dolls & Dollhouses > Fashion Dolls
title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures Doll, 11.5-inch Blonde, in Denim Dress
description: Spark storytelling fun with this Barbie doll inspired by the hit series, Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures! She's ready for any adventure in her stylish denim shirt-dress with a pink and white belt. With casual pink shoes, she can go anywhere kids' imaginations take them. Doll cannot stand alone.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_toys_789103_ravensburger_puzzle_1000pc
categories: Toys & Games > Games & Puzzles > Jigsaw Puzzles (By Piece Count)
title: Ravensburger "Scenic Overlook" 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle for Adults
description: Escape to a peaceful vista with the Ravensburger "Scenic Overlook" puzzle. This 1000-piece puzzle features a breathtaking landscape image, crafted with our exclusive Softclick Technology for a perfect, interlocking fit. Made from premium, durable materials, it offers a relaxing and rewarding challenge for puzzle enthusiasts.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_toys_789104_rc_monster_truck
categories: Toys & Games > Vehicles, Trains & RC > Remote Control Cars & Drones
title: Velocity Toys Rock Crawler Remote Control Monster Truck, 1:18 Scale, 4WD Off-Road RC Car
description: Conquer any terrain with the Velocity Toys Rock Crawler Monster Truck. This 4-wheel drive RC car is built for tough, off-road action with oversized all-terrain tires and high-strength shock absorbers. The 2.4GHz remote control provides a long range and interference-free operation, making it perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_baby_789105_vtech_sit_to_stand_walker
categories: Learning & STEM > Early Development Toys > Baby Walkers & Activity Centers
title: VTech Sit-To-Stand Learning Walker (Frustration Free Packaging), Blue
description: From baby steps to big steps the Sit-to-Stand Learning Walker by VTech helps your baby develop from a crawler to a walker through adaptive technology. With a barnyard of playful friends to cheer them on, your little one will have endless fun as they learn to walk. Features a removable play panel for floor play or on-the-run fun.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_learning_789106_national_geographic_crystal_kit
categories: Learning & STEM > STEM Toys > Science Kits & Experiments
title: National Geographic Mega Crystal Growing Lab - Grow 6 Vibrant Crystals in as Little as 3 Days!
description: Science has never been so fun and colorful! The National Geographic Mega Crystal Growing Lab lets you grow six amazing crystals in different colors. This easy-to-use kit includes everything you need, a full-color learning guide, and a light-up display stand to showcase your beautiful creations. A fantastic STEM gift for any curious kid.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_outdoor_789107_radio_flyer_balance_bike
categories: Outdoor & Ride-On Toys > Bikes & Skates > Balance Bikes
title: Radio Flyer Glide & Go Balance Bike, Red
description: Give your child the confidence to ride with the Radio Flyer Glide & Go Balance Bike. This pedal-free bike helps toddlers focus on the fundamentals of balance, making the transition to a two-wheeler easy and fun. Featuring an adjustable seat, maintenance-free tires, and a sturdy steel frame, it's the perfect first bike for kids aged 2.5 to 5 years.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_nursery_789108_lambs_ivy_bedding_set
categories: Nursery & Decor > Nursery Bedding > Crib Bedding Sets
title: Lambs & Ivy Future All Star 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set - Blue/Gray Sports Theme
description: Create a dreamy, sports-themed nursery for your little champion with the Future All Star 4-Piece Crib Bedding Set. This charming collection includes a comforter, fitted crib sheet, crib skirt, and a storage organizer. Featuring embroidered animals playing their favorite sports in shades of blue, gray, and white.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_gear_789109_graco_4ever_carseat
categories: Baby & Toddler Gear > Car Seats > Convertible Car Seats
Baby & Toddler Gear > Car Seats > All-in-One Car Seats
title: Graco 4Ever DLX 4-in-1 Convertible Car Seat, Fairmont
description: The Graco 4Ever DLX 4-in-1 Car Seat gives you 10 years of use with one car seat. It’s comfortable for your child and convenient for you as it transitions from a rear-facing harness (4–40 lb) to a forward-facing harness (22–65 lb), to a highback booster (40–100 lb), and to a backless booster (40–120 lb). With Simply Safe Adjust Harness System and 10-position headrest.

name: projects/sears-project/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/sears_electronics_789110_amazon_fire_kids_tablet
categories: Video Games & Electronics > Kids' Electronics > Kids' Tablets
title: Amazon Fire HD 8 Kids Tablet, 8" HD display, ages 3-7, 32 GB, Blue Kid-Proof Case
description: A full-featured tablet for kids ages 3-7 that includes 1 year of Amazon Kids+ content and a Kid-Proof Case with a built-in stand. Enjoy the 8" HD display, 2 GB RAM, 32 GB internal storage, and up to 12 hours of battery life. Includes a 2-year worry-free guarantee: if it breaks, return it and we'll replace it for free.
